pages.text: $(li)Warpbeetles are little creatures that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/nether/warped_forest)Warped Forests$(/l) of the Nether or in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/mushroom/mushroom_fields)Mushroom Fields$(/l) of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They will not attack you, even if you are close of them.$(br)$(li)Attacking them will force them to teleport away in panic, but they will still not attack you.
They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/warped_fungus)Warped Fungus$(/l) on death.
